# AVPlayerLooper.Status.failed

**Case**

The looper isn’t able to perform looping playback due to an error.

## Declaration

```swift
case failed
```

## Discussion

Examine the looper’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerLooper/error] property to determine the cause of the failure.

## Status values

- **AVPlayerLooper.Status.unknown**: The status isn’t known.
- **AVPlayerLooper.Status.ready**: The looper is ready to perform looping playback.
- **AVPlayerLooper.Status.cancelled**: The app canceled looping on the player.
